Atalaltan, atai nankal nirakarittu vittom)'' enrum kurukinranar. Avarkal i(vvunmaiyana vetat)taip pinparrata nilaimaiyil, itu palankalattup poyyana kattukkataikaltan enrum avarkal kuruvarkal
